name: ACOProxy
description: ACOProxy. A proxy contract that implements delegation of calls to other contracts.

functionDecorators.name: admin
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the proxy admin address.

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the proxy implementation address.

functionDecorators.name: proxyType
functionDecorators.description: Function to be compliance with EIP 897. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-897.md It is an "upgradable proxy".

functionDecorators.name: setImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the proxy implementation address. Only can be called by the proxy admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new proxy implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: initData
parameterDecorators.description: ABI encoded with signature data that will be delegated over the new implementation.

functionDecorators.name: transferProxyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the proxy admin address. Only can be called by the proxy admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new proxy admin.
